Hannibal died on January 30, 2014, at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== *Discography at Soulfulkindsmusic.net *Discography at Koti.mbnet.fi *Review of Hannibalism from The Tuscaloosa News at News.google.com Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American R&B; singers Category:American record producers Category:American singer- songwriters Category:Singers from Atlanta
